thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Angela O'Brien
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Angela O'Brien

author: Angela O'Brien
title: Angela O'Brien
text: I made a mistake as to where the goods were coming from and queried the shipping costs, I received a promt and polite answer to my question. I was able to then purchase my treasure after a few very friendly emails from the seller who was very patient with me and my mistakes. I rate this purchase a very satisfying experience
